input.sentences: the market was exotic to walk around and view .
there were flowers near the market with beautiful colors .
the sign indicated we had made it to the market .
later that night a [female] jam concert was awesome .
the organization the next day was just what was needed .
output.sentences: He took a walk in view of a market.
The market had many flowers in a variety of colors.
A sign stood at the entrance of the market.
At night, a band had a jam session, led by a female vocalist.
He reported back to the organization the next day.
